Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to offers and agreements to locate and retrieve abandoned property
Summary: Requires solicitations and agreements to locate and retrieve abandoned property to provide certain disclosures in large type on the first page of any notice or agreement.
LawCode: Amd ยง1416, Ab Prop L; amd ยง393-e, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the abandoned property law and the general business law, in relation to agreements and solicitations to locate and retrieve abandoned property
